name: middlingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is medium or average, and neither very good nor very bad: The classes taught by the new teacher did well, and the others only middlingly. He was only middlingly successful at university, and later at the BBC.
More examplesFewer examplesShe is a middlingly famous photographer who doesn't need fame to have some success on the internet.He was born in rural France to a middlingly important family.She went on to open a middlingly successful flower shop.
